content:
Hello Community,

We are reviewing older feature requests in Dataverse Github and would like to know if there is an active interest in this support.

You can see the GitHub ticket here:Â https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/1592

Please chime in on Github as that is where we will make decisions.

Regards
Sonia

Check it out! @Paul Boon just let us know that he created a DCAT-AP exporter!

See https://github.com/Dans-labs/dataverse-exporter-dcatap via https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/1592#issuecomment-3548051224
Related: #troubleshooting > Collection custom metadata & DCAT-AP
Sorry for the short notice but in two hours @Sjaak Derksen will be talking about DCAT at the community call: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/sM5Kdwy1lT0/m/2Z-7a8fcBQAJ
64 messages were moved here from #troubleshooting > Collection custom metadata & DCAT-AP by Philip Durbin ðŸš€.
I just consolidated the two related Zulip topics about DCAT into this one. @AsbjÃ¸rn SkÃ¸dt I hope you don't mind!
The recording of @Sjaak Derksen's presentation is up! Also, the slides and notes.
I'm working on moving his repo to the gdcc org but I'm hitting a snag, getting a 404, like this: https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/176383
Ok, we were able to move it. Here it is: https://github.com/gdcc/exporter-dcat3
Pull requests welcome! :crazy:

I don't mind.
I would have liked to participate in the community call, but I could not with short notice.

As I understand it from the video presentation, the exporter-dcat3 is the way forward for the community.
@Sjaak Derksen I know this may be much to ask. Will you be available for a meeting with me to go over what we need to do to produce the compliant DCAT-AP-DK properties files? It is not as clear to me at the moment as I would like.
@AsbjÃ¸rn SkÃ¸dt No problem.. I be happy to.. I Just opened a PR to centralise the application profiles and it would be very nice to also have the DCAT-AP-DK in place..
Let me know what suits you? Since we are starting up the year, I've some time available today and tomorrow..
Great, thanks. we should have the same time zone. do you have time at 14-15 tomorrow?
I have a talk with my manager at 14:00. However.. I do have time from 15:00 onward. It's that ok for you as well?

I did merge my PR.. So, now there's a directory on top level called application_profiles containing a lightweight profile and my attempt at the dutch application profile. Next week I need to sit together with my colleagues to see if something is missing or should be done differently. So there will still be some changes. But I guess it's a starting point for you as well. I did also update the README.md files

Yup, I have sent you a meeting invite.
Talk tomorrow.

Hi Asbjorn. .perhaps its good to contact your fellow countryman at Geus. They have a dataverse as well and I guess the same kind of obligations that you have (harvesting DCAT). Perhaps you collaborate on that one?
I just fixed some issues and pushed the updates
